verses.text: And the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* came upon \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Oded|strong="H5752"\w*:

And he went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w meet|strong="H6440"\w* \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye me, \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w*, and all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*; The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* with you, while ye be with him; and if ye \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* him, he will be \w found|strong="H4672"\w* of you; but if ye \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* him, he will \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* you.\f + \fr 15.2 \ft to meet…: Heb. before Asa\f*

Now for a \w long|strong="H7227"\w* \w season|strong="H3117"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add hath been\add* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* the \w true|strong="H0571"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and without a \w teaching|strong="H3384"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and without \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.

But when they in their \w trouble|strong="H6862"\w* did \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* him, he was \w found|strong="H4672"\w* of them.

And in those \w times|strong="H6256"\w* \add there was\add* no \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* to him that went \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, nor to him that came \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, but \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w vexations|strong="H4103"\w* \add were\add* upon all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*.

And \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* was \w destroyed|strong="H3807"\w* of \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, and \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: for \w God|strong="H0430"\w* did \w vex|strong="H2000"\w* them with all \w adversity|strong="H6869"\w*.\f + \fr 15.6 \ft destroyed: Heb. beaten in pieces\f*

Be ye \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* therefore, and let not your \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* be \w weak|strong="H7503"\w*: for your \w work|strong="H6468"\w* shall \w be|strong="H3426"\w* \w rewarded|strong="H7939"\w*.

And when \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, and the \w prophecy|strong="H5016"\w* of \w Oded|strong="H5752"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, he took \w courage|strong="H2388"\w*, and put \w away|strong="H5674"\w* the abominable \w idols|strong="H8251"\w* out of all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, and out of the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* which he had \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* from \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, and \w renewed|strong="H2318"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the

And he \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, and the \w strangers|strong="H1481"\w* with them out of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* and \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, and out of \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*: for they \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* to him out of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*, when they \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add was\add* with him.

So they gathered themselves \w together|strong="H6908"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* in the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, in the \w fifteenth|strong="H2568"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of the \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* of \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w*.

And they \w offered|strong="H2076"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* the same \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, of the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* \add which\add* they had \w brought|strong="H0935"\w*, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*.\f + \fr 15.11 \ft the same…: Heb. in that day\f*

And they \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* into a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* with all their \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* and with all their \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*;

That whosoever would not \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* should be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, \w whether|strong="H4480"\w* \w small|strong="H6996"\w* or \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, whether \w man|strong="H0376"\w* or \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*.

And they \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* with a \w loud|strong="H1419"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and with \w shouting|strong="H8643"\w*, and with \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*, and with \w cornets|strong="H7782"\w*.

And all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w* at the \w oath|strong="H7621"\w*: for they had \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* with all their \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* him with their whole \w desire|strong="H7522"\w*; and he was \w found|strong="H4672"\w* of them: and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* gave them \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

¶ And also \add concerning\add* \w Maachah|strong="H4601"\w* the \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* of \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, he \w removed|strong="H5493"\w* her from \add being\add* \w queen|strong="H1377"\w*, because she had \w made|strong="H6213"\w* an \w idol|strong="H4656"\w* in a \w grove|strong="H0842"\w*: and \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* cut \w down|strong="H3772"\w* her \w idol|strong="H4656"\w*, and \w stamped|strong="H1854"\w* \add it\add*, and \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* \add it\add* at the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w Kidron|strong="H6939"\w*.\f + \fr 15.16 \ft mother: that is, grandmother\f*\f + \fr 15.16 \ft idol: Heb. horror\f*

But the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* were not taken \w away|strong="H5493"\w* out of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: nevertheless the \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* of \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* was \w perfect|strong="H8003"\w* all his \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

¶ And he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* the things that his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* had \w dedicated|strong="H6944"\w*, and that he himself had \w dedicated|strong="H6944"\w*, \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*.

And there was no \add more\add* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* unto the \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w thirtieth|strong="H7970"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of the \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* of \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w*.
